patthana14.16:1.1_0: Āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.16:1.1_1: Āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.16:1.1_2: Āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.16:2.1_0: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.16:3.1_0: Āsavañceva sāsavañca sāsavañceva no ca āsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.16:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha nava.)
